Package org.threadly.concurrent.future

Implementations of different futures and future utilities.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FutureFuture.TaskCanceler
    A canceler which this future will use if a parent future has not been set.
    ListenableFuture<T>
    Future where you can add a listener which is called once the future has completed.
    ListenableRunnableFuture<T>
    This is a ListenableFuture which can be executed.
    ListenableScheduledFuture<T>
    Interface which includes the ScheduledFuture interface as well as the ListenableFuture interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FutureFuture<T>
    Future implementation which contains a parent Future.
    FutureListenableFuture<T>
    ListenableFuture implementation which contains a parent ListenableFuture.
    FutureUtils
    A collection of small utilities for handling futures.
    ListenableFutureTask<T>
    This is a future which can be executed.
    ListenableFutureVirtualTask<T>
    A slightly more heavy weight implementation of ListenableFutureTask which can handle VirtualCallable and VirtualRunnable testable architectures.
    ScheduledFutureDelegate<T>
    Implementation which handles the ScheduledFuture interface as well as the ListenableFuture interface.
    StaticCancellationException
    Class to hold a singleton CancellationException to prevent needing to construct it.

Package org.threadly.concurrent.future Description

Implementations of different futures and future utilities.
